name: Kindergarten (itch) (GrabeR)
description:
!!THERE IS AN ENDING!!

!!IF YOU STUCK, ENABLE COOKIES ON THE SITE!!

 Please finish the game. Its only 10 minutes long!

Use WASD or arrows to move and mouse to interact.

Made by GrabeR and his friends for Mini jam 112

We are students from Ukraine. With this little story we wanted to show how unfair and tragic this war is. 

Theme: only 3 buttons
